mapper.sql: a.t_O_ID, a.t_O_CertificationCode, a.t_O_OrgName, a.t_O_EmployeeAmount, a.t_O_Category, a.t_O_listOrg, a.t_O_OrgRepresentative, a.t_O_OrgPayrollBankaccount, a.t_O_OrgChinaebiAcc, a.t_O_OrgSandeAcc, a.t_O_OrgStatus, a.t_O_OrgPending, a.t_O_SysUpdateDate, a.platform, a.remark, a.creator, a.create_time, a.modifier, a.modify_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_organization_info a where a.t_O_ID = #{t_O_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.create_time

select
from t_organization_info a where a.t_O_OrgName = #{t_O_OrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.create_time

select
from t_organization_info a where
a.t_O_OrgName like CONCAT('%',#{t_O_OrgName},'%')
and a.t_O_Category like CONCAT('%',#{t_O_Category},'%')
and a.t_O_OrgStatus like CONCAT('%',#{t_O_OrgStatus},'%')
and a.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
and a.create_time like CONCAT('%',DATE(#{create_time}),'%')
order by create_time

t_O_CertificationCode,

mapper.select:
select
from t_organization_info a where 1=1
and type <= #{typeEnd}
order by a.create_time

select
from t_organization_info a where t_O_OrgStatus = "on"
and a.t_O_OrgPending = #{t_P_VendorEmployeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by a.create_time
select t_O_OrgName from t_organization_info a where t_O_OrgStatus = "on" and a.t_O_OrgName != "ALL" order by a.create_time
mapper.update:
update t_organization_info
t_O_ID = #{t_O_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_O_CertificationCode = #{t_O_CertificationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_O_OrgName = #{t_O_OrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_O_EmployeeAmount = #{t_O_EmployeeAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_O_Category = #{t_O_Category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_O_listOrg = #{t_O_listOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_O_OrgRepresentative = #{t_O_OrgRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_O_OrgPayrollBankaccount = #{t_O_OrgPayrollBankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_O_OrgChinaebiAcc = #{t_O_OrgChinaebiAcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_O_OrgSandeAcc = #{t_O_OrgSandeAcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_O_OrgStatus = #{t_O_OrgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_O_OrgPending = #{t_O_OrgPending,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_O_SysUpdateDate = #{t_O_SysUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
platform = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where t_O_ID = #{t_O_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_organization_info
t_O_OrgPayrollBankaccount = #{t_O_OrgPayrollBankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
platform = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where t_O_ID = #{t_O_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t_O_OrgName from t_organization_info a where a.t_O_listOrg = #{t_O_listOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
